Html: Is the wave stream class and all of its descendants fully managed? I would like to do some manipulation of a wav file under mono and the WaveFileReader class has everything I need.
WaveFileReader and WaveFileWriter uses File read/write which I'm sure mono supports. You won't be able to do any format conversion though since that calls into the Windows ACM APIs
By format conversion are you referring to changing from pcm to another audio format, or pcm to pcm format conversions like a change from stereo to mono?
